btn_preview_ON_PUSH_EVENT(BBjButtonPushEvent pEvent!) - method in class ImageManager

Event handler for the ON_BUTTON_PUSH event for all Buttons that contain pictures if the button does not contain any picutre a dialog window will open and you can select a picture if the button does contain an picture the method puts the picture in the preview button
